ifTrueActivities.name: Full Load Every Months 1st Date pipeline Execute

typeProperties.body:

activities.name: Hyderation file from sharepoint to metadata
Hyderation file copy from adls to db

dependsOn.activity: Hyderation file from sharepoint to metadata

activities.name: Extract Table Names for Full Load

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select schemaa,tableName from mt.tableList
where status=1

dependsOn.activity: Extract Table Names for Full Load

activities.name: Migrate Data From ONprem To Adls
Extract Table Names For Full Load And Incremental Load

dependsOn.activity: Extract Table Names For Full Load And Incremental Load

items.value: @activity('Extract Table Names For Full Load And Incremental Load').output.value

activities.name: Stg Db Fi To Final Db Frt

dependsOn.activity: Extract Table Names For Full Load And Incremental Load

items.value: @activity('Extract Table Names For Full Load And Incremental Load').output.value

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select * from ',item().schemaa,'.',item().tableName,' where LastModified>''',activity('Watermark Value').output.firstRow.watermark_DateTime,'''',' and LastModified <=''',activity('Max Date From Source').output.firstRow.LastModified,'''')

@concat('select * from ',item().schemaa,'.',item().tableName,' where LastModified>''',activity('Watermark Value').output.firstRow.watermark_DateTime,'''',' and LastModified <=''',activity('Max Date From Source').output.firstRow.LastModified,'''')

text.value: @concat('update mt.watermarkTables set watermark_DateTime = ''',activity('Max Date From Source').output.firstRow.LastModified,'''',' where tableName= ''',item().tableName,'''')

activities.name: Merge From Fi to main Table Frt

dependsOn.activity: Extract Table Names For Full Load And Incremental Load

items.value: @activity('Extract Table Names For Full Load And Incremental Load').output.value

activities.name: Incremental Load Loop Based On Id

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select * from ',item().schemaa,'.',item().tableName,' where ID>''',activity('Watermark ID').output.firstRow.watermark_id,'''',' and ID <=''',activity('Max Id From Source').output.firstRow.ID,'''')

@concat('select * from ',item().schemaa,'.',item().tableName,' where ID>''',activity('Watermark ID').output.firstRow.watermark_id,'''',' and ID <=''',activity('Max Id From Source').output.firstRow.ID,'''')

text.value: @concat('update mt.watermarkTables set watermark_id = ''',activity('Max Id From Source').output.firstRow.ID,'''',' where tableName= ''',item().tableName,'''')

activities.name: Stg Db Fi To Final Db Frt ID

dependsOn.activity: Incremental Load Loop Based On Id
